hints.content:
$\red{60}$ bricks is the same as  $\red{6\text{ groups of ten}}$ bricks.

There are $\blue8$ walls.

Total number of bricks:  
$\begin{align}&\blue8\times\red{6\text{ groups of ten}}\\
=&\purple{48\text{ groups of ten}}\\
=&\purple{480}\end{align}$

question.content:
Part of the castle needs repairs. $8$ walls need to be rebuilt, and $60$ bricks are needed for each wall.

**How many bricks are needed in all?**
